title: Data centers and AI are helping my Georgia city punch above its weight

content:

title: Warm-skinned AI robot with camera eyes is seriously creepy
description: The humanoid robot Moya from Shanghai startup DroidUp features warm skin between 90°F and 97°F, making it the world's first biometric artificial intelligence robot.

title: How AI Trends Are Influencing Birthday Return Gifts in 2026
description: In 2026, birthday parties will be infinitely different from how they used to be just a few years ago, and one of the causes is the concept of artificial intelligence. title: Union Education Minister Unveils BS & MBA Programs In Artificial Intelligence At IIM Lucknow
description: Union Education Minister Dharmendra Pradhan launched three new AI courses at IIM Lucknow: a four-year BS in AI & Business Analytics, a Tech MBA, and an integrated BS + Tech MBA. Aimed at building India’s AI leadership, the programs blend technology and business skills to develop indigenous solutions and foster innovation for societal and economic progress.
content:
New Delhi: Union Education Minister Dharmendra Pradhan on Thursday launched three new courses on Artificial Intelligence which will be offered by Indian Institute of Management (IIM), Lucknow.

title: Bajaj Finance uses AI to process 20 mn calls, targets 100 mn next year as deployment scales up
description: Bajaj Finance aims to enhance operational efficiency, strengthen trust, and drive higher productivity across its business and accelerating its artificial intelligence journey from innovation to measurable business impact, with the company now formally tracking and disclosing AI benefit metrics to the market.
content:

title: AI to slow IT growth, not kill the model: Sandip Agarwal warns on valuations
description: Indian IT services firms face a growth slowdown due to Artificial Intelligence. AI tools reduce project effort, impacting billing. Large IT firms expect 5-6% revenue growth, while mid-cap firms anticipate 10-12%. Contract renewals may lead to pricing cuts. India's position as the world's software factory remains secure. Valuations may need adjustment in this new growth environment.
content:
Synopsis

title: AI Can Be Transformational and Still Be a Bubble
description: It’s hard not to marvel at how America’s capital markets have rallied to finance the artificial intelligence boom. If all goes as expected, “hyperscalers” such as Meta Platforms Inc. will invest more than $3 trillion through 2030 in data and power infrastructure. It’s an endeavor orders of magnitude greater than the Manhattan Project, funded entirely by private shareholders and creditors.

title: Dharmendra Pradhan launches 3 new AI courses to be offered by IIM Lucknow
description: Union Education Minister Dharmendra Pradhan on Thursday launched three new courses on Artificial Intelligence which will be offered by Indian Institute of Management IIM, Lucknow. We aim to bridge the gap between technology innovation and commercially viable business models which will serve as a powerful catalyst in developing AI capacity, said MP Gupta, Director, IIM Lucknow.
